about.name: Ashwin Raj
about.shortInfo: A passionate Software Engineer with 4 years of experience, creating impactful solutions and finding balance through music.
about.longInfo: I’m a detail-oriented software engineer with 4 years of experience building scalable, user-friendly applications using Angular, React, Next.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, and Azure. I enjoy solving complex problems through clean, efficient code and thrive in collaborative, agile environments. I also have experience in composing and performing music — I play the guitar and sing classical music, which keeps me creative and balanced. I'm always eager to learn, contribute to open-source projects, and bring fresh, innovative ideas to every challenge.
